before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bk99t","text":"Tissue should be processed as described previously (dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.eq2lyjynelx9/v1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77opg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t8ih","text":"DAPI-containing Fluoromount-G for the final step does not need to be made fresh. However, if it is out of stock it should be made at least one day prior to RNAscope + IHC assay: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4mss","text":"1.    Pipet DAPI to Fluoromount-G to reach a concentration of 0.5 µg/mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bs2hr","text":"2.    Pipet up and down several times to mix, then vortex for at least 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7m53","text":"3.    Wait at least 24 hours before use. Container should always be covered in foil and stored at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"chc09","text":"Here we describe labeling coronal sections of mouse substantia nigra (SNc) and ventral tegmental area\n(VTA) for the gene Slc17a6 (VGLUT2) and virally-expressed histone-tagged GFP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":121,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmf6f","text":"Turn on HybEZ™ Oven (ACD) and set to 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cj6vo","text":"Warm probe in heat-bath for 10 minutes at 40°C, then cool to RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"carja","text":"Drop C1 probe into autoclaved Eppendorf tube. Prepare about 150 µL per slide, assuming each slide contains 4 coronal mouse sections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o33i","text":"Fix slides in RNAse-free PBS containing 4% paraformaldehyde at 4°C for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i8dg","text":"Dehydrate slides in serial ethanol (EtOH) washes: 2 minutes in 50% EtOH, 2 minutes in 70% EtOH, 2 minutes in 100% EtOH twice. Make EtOH dilutions with ultrapure water in sterile conical tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d01m3","text":"Air dry slides for 2 to 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"g4es","text":"Use hydrophobic pen to draw a barrier around sections. Air dry for 2 to 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rht5","text":"Incubate slides with protease IV at RT for 30 min. Keep slides covered to prevent dust contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1e6i1","text":"Rinse slides in RNAse-free 1X PBS at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4a8nq","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides by gently tapping the slide edge on a paper towel. Pipette enough probe mixture to cover sections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7mjd9","text":"Incubate for 2 hours in the HybEZ™ Oven at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7brns","text":"Wash in 1X wash buffer for 2 minutes, twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14l7j","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides and add enough AMP1 to cover sections. Incubate for 30 minutes in the HybEZ™ Oven at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2uel4","text":"Wash in 1X wash buffer for 2 minutes, twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44qbg","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides and add enough AMP2 to cover sections. Incubate for 30 minutes in the HybEZ™ Oven at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2upq9","text":"Wash in 1X wash buffer for 2 minutes, twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5eadp","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides and add enough AMP3 to cover sections. Incubate for 30 minutes in the HybEZ™ Oven at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ag73","text":"Wash in 1X wash buffer for 2 minutes, twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15c6b","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides and add enough AMP4A to cover sections. Incubate for 30 minutes in the HybEZ™ Oven at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cpa0s","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3h9cs","text":"Wash in 1X PBS at RT, twice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ad2d","text":"Incubate each slide with approximately 150 µL of blocking buffer (4% normal donkey serum in 1X PBS with 0.2% Triton X-100) for 1 hour at RT, in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fovjd","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides, then incubate each slide with approximately 150 µL of primary antibody mixture (chicken anti-GFP diluted 1:10,000 in 4% normal donkey serum in 1X PBS with 0.2% Triton X-100) overnight at 4°C, in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ed5ae","text":"Wash slides in PBS for 5 minutes at RT, three times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fm7c0","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides, then incubate each slide with approximately 150 µL of secondary antibody mixture (donkey anti-Chicken 488 diluted 1:400 in 4% normal donkey serum in 1X PBS) for 2 hours at RT, in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5pm04","text":"Wash slides in PBS for 15 minutes at RT, three times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ub2v","text":"Briefly rinse slides in wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1amh2","text":"Decant excess liquid from slides, add DAPI-containing Fluoromount-G, and coverslip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"apo4r","text":"Store slides in the dark at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Combined RNAscope and immunohistochemistry labeling of fresh mouse midbrain tissue
title_html: Combined RNAscope and immunohistochemistry labeling of fresh mouse midbrain tissue
